alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Eastern Ascension; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 3:49PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Ascension, southern Livingston and southwestern Tangipahoa Parishes through 415 PM CDT... At 349 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Whitehall, or 15 miles northeast of Gonzales, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ponchatoula, French Settlement, Port Vincent, Springfield, Whitehall and Killian. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 31 and 36. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 22 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Eastern Ascension; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston
